scripts.deploy:example: pnpm run deploy:adapter-example && pnpm run deploy:cross-chain-example
scripts.deploy:adapter-example: pnpm run adapter-example:build && pnpm run adapter-example:export && touch ./apps/nextjs-example/out/.nojekyll && gh-pages --dist apps/nextjs-example/out --dotfiles
scripts.deploy:cross-chain-example: pnpm run cross-chain-example:build && pnpm run cross-chain-example:export && touch ./apps/nextjs-x-chain/out/.nojekyll && gh-pages --dist apps/nextjs-x-chain/out --dest nextjs-cross-chain-example --dotfiles
scripts.deploy:example-testing: pnpm run example:build && pnpm run example:export && touch ./apps/nextjs-example/out/.nojekyll && gh-pages --dist apps/nextjs-example/out --dest nextjs-example-testing --dotfiles
scripts.deploy:example-vue: pnpm run vue-example:build && touch ./apps/nuxt-example/.output/public/.nojekyll && gh-pages --dist apps/nuxt-example/.output/public --dest nuxt-example --dotfiles
